original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son,

original: nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
analyzed: nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
translated: in the western direction, beyond worlds as numerous as the grains of sand in the Ganges river, there is a world called Endurance.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste /
translated: In that world, the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha Śākyamuni resides, lives, and thrives.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te /🔽@109a *// mthu de lta bu de ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te / @109a *// mthu de lta bu de ni /
translated: He teaches the Dharma in the form of the bodhisattva canon.🔽Such is his power.

original: de'i yin no //
analyzed: de'i yin no //
translated: Such is his might.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o //
translated: I will go to that world of Endurance to see, venerate, and serve the blessed thus-gone Śākyamuni.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go cha'i lag par padma chen po gcig byin te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go cha'i lag par padma chen po gcig byin te /
translated: Then that Bhagavat gave a great lotus to the bodhisattva Apāyajaṅgama.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son,

original: khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di phul la /
analyzed: khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di phul la /
translated: you should offer this to that Bhagavat

original: nga'i tshig gis de bzhin du gsol cig /
analyzed: nga'i tshig gis de bzhin du gsol cig /
translated: and ask him about the same practice that I have asked about.🔽”🔽Then that bodhisattva, having been given permission by that Bhagavat, bowed his head to the feet of that Bhagavat🔽and, having circumambulated him to the right three times,🔽disappeared from that universe and arrived in this Sahā universe.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te /
translated: He approached the Bhagavat Śākyamuni

original: 'di lta ste /🔽skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am /🔽lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang / thad gcig dang / yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te /🔽'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskum pa rkyong bar byed pa'am / lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang / thad gcig dang / yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug go /
translated: and said to him,🔽“Bhagavat, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfect and Complete Buddha Apāyajaṅghamakuṭodgata­śrī­rāja

original: de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der song ste /
analyzed: de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der song ste /

Are they not full of faults

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyags btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyags btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: He bowed his head to the feet of the Buddha, and said:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,🔽the thus-gone one asks whether you have encountered but little hardship

original: bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam /🔽nyam nga ba nyung ngam /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam / nyam nga ba nyung ngam /
translated: and have had but little trouble,

original: bskyod pa yang ngam /🔽stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa du ma rnam par @109b 'phrul pa snyun gsol zhing /
analyzed: bskyod pa yang ngam / stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa du ma rnam par @109b 'phrul pa snyun gsol zhing /
translated: whether you are well and strong,

original: bcom ldan 'das la padma chen po 'di'ang bcom ldan 'das des bskur ba lags na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la padma chen po 'di'ang bcom ldan 'das des bskur ba lags na /
translated: and whether you remain in touch with pleasant sensations. He also sends you this great lotus.🔽Blessed One, out of compassion for us, please accept it.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes su gsol; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes su gsol; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te /
translated: The Blessed One accepted it,

original: bzhes nas kyang bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bzhes nas kyang bka' stsal pa /
translated: and then said:

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son,

original: ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga'am /
analyzed: ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga'am /
translated: is that blessed one free from pain,

original: stobs dang ldan nam /🔽bde ba dang ldan nam /
analyzed: stobs dang ldan nam / bde ba dang ldan nam /
translated: is he strong,🔽is he well,

original: 'gyur ba mi mnga' ma /
analyzed: 'gyur ba mi mnga' ma /
translated: and is he living in comfort?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de lta lags so //
analyzed: de lta lags so //
translated: that is so.”

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: Situated beyond that universe was a universe known as Various Banners.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: In that universe resided the thus-gone Supreme Accumulations. Abiding and remaining present there, he taught the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan sa ya na zhes bya ba chos kyi skyes byin nas btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan sa ya na zhes bya ba chos kyi skyes byin nas btang ngo //
translated: This blessed one now dispatched his regent, the bodhisattva Banner of the Earth.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs su rnam pa bsgrags pa zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs su rnam pa bsgrags pa zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: Situated beyond that universe was a universe known as Renowned in All Directions.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog tshogs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog tshogs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: In that universe resided the thus-gone Splendorous with the Glory of Flowery Accumulations. Abiding and remaining present there, he taught the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This blessed one now dispatched his regent, the bodhisattva Amoghadhvaja.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje yang dag gnas zhes bya ba yod de /🔽de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes @110a *//
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje yang dag gnas zhes bya ba yod de / de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes @110a *//
translated: “Beyond that, past as many buddhafields as atoms in a buddhafield, there is a world system called Vajra­sthita,

original: bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: in which the Tathāgata Buddha­kusuma­abhyudgata­rāja resides, lives, dwells, exists, teaches the Dharma, and so forth.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This blessed one has dispatched his regent, the bodhisattva Ratna­tejas.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsandan gyi phug ces bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams tsandan gyi phug ces bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many buddhafields as atoms in a buddhafield, there is a world system called Candana­guhā,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i lus zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te; bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu bltas pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i lus zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te; bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu bltas pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: in which the Tathāgata Ratna­śarīra resides, lives, dwells, exists, teaches the Dharma, and so forth. This blessed one has dispatched his regent, the bodhisattva Samanta­avalokita­nāda.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtsi lta bu zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtsi lta bu zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many buddhafields as atoms in a buddhafield, there is a world system called Oshadhi,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod ming bsgrags dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod ming bsgrags dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: The Tathagata Amoghasri, the One of Revered Power, lives there, exists there, and teaches the Law.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod go cha bgos zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod go cha bgos zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This exalted Buddha has sent forth the Bodhisattva his regent, called Armor of Unfailing Purpose.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sman 'phags zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sman 'phags zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: Again, there is a world sphere beyond that one called Noble Medicine,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas brtson 'grus go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas brtson 'grus go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: and in it the Tathagata called Armor of Infinite Virtue and Effort lives, exists, and teaches the Law.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yang dag par byin pa'i bslab pa blangs zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yang dag par byin pa'i bslab pa blangs zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This exalted Buddha has sent forth the Bodhisattva his regent, called Taking the Training of Perfect Giving.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas brgyan ces bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas brgyan ces bya ba yod de /
translated: Again, there is a world sphere beyond that one called All-Ornamented,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems bskyed ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyan mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho @110b zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems bskyed ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyan mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho @110b zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: The Tathagata named Sarva-sattva-citta-alamkara-karota-samanantara-cittotpada resides there, lives there, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na padma zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na padma zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Bhagavat has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva, Padmahasta.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: There is a world system called Ekachattra,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
translated: where the Tathagata named Somavali resides, lives, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Bhagavat has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva Ratnavali.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams padma'i 'od zer ces bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams padma'i 'od zer ces bya ba yod de /
translated: There is a world system called Padma-raśmi,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: The Tathagata Arciskandha resides there, lives there, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Bhagavat has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva, Very Firm.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: Furthermore, there is a world system called Array of Happiness.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: The Tathagata Gunarajanaprabha resides there, lives there, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan thams cad rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan thams cad rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Bhagavat has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva All Qualities Well-Established.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: Furthermore, there is a world system called Array of Infinite Qualities.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /🔽bcom ldan 'das des byang chub @111a *//
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te / bcom ldan 'das des byang chub @111a *//
translated: There the Tathagata Gunaparamita resides, remaining alive and teaching the Dharma.

original: sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan mtha' yas bsgrags zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan mtha' yas bsgrags zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This blessed one has dispatched his regent, the bodhisattva Ananta­guna­kirti.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs su rab grags zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs su rab grags zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Furthermore, there is a world system called Discernible in All Directions.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: There the Tathagata Dipamkara resides, remains alive, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyod pa thams cad 'gyur ba zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyod pa thams cad 'gyur ba zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This blessed one has dispatched his regent, the bodhisattva Sarva­carita­cintin.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams lhas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams lhas brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Furthermore, there is a world system called Adorned by the Gods.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: There the Tathagata Devaraja resides, remains alive, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Tathagata has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva, Light of Wisdom.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shing thags bzang po can zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shing thags bzang po can zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-land, is a world called Fine Tree,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: where the Tathagata called Source of Light lives, lives well, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Tathagata has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva called Source of Virtue.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many worlds as atoms in a buddha-land, is a world called Good,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: where the Tathagata called Fearless lives, lives well, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems @111b dpa' rgyal tshab srid pa sel ces bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems @111b dpa' rgyal tshab srid pa sel ces bya ba btang ngo //

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya ba yod de /

analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa bha gi ra sa'i sras zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba yod de /

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: where the thus-gone Fearless resides, lives, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This blessed one now sends forth his regent, the bodhisattva Fearless.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams padma zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams padma zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, there is a world system called Lotus,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa padma mchog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa padma mchog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: The Tathagata Padma-vara-rajsri resides there, lives there, and teaches the Dharma.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na ye shes zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Bhagavat has dispatched his regent, the Bodhisattva Jnanadhara.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams autpa la zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams autpa la zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: There is a world system called Utpalavati,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes autpa la'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes autpa la'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: and in it resides the Tathagata Jnanotpalasri.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yul na mi gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo //🔽de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen 'phags @112a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yul na mi gnas pa zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen 'phags @112a *//
translated: This Bhagavat has dispatched his regent, the Bodhisattva Asthira.

original: zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: There is a world system called Ratna-udgata,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: and in it resides the Tathagata Ratnâkara.🔽This Bhagavat has dispatched his regent, the Bodhisattva Ratnaprabha.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This tathagata dispatched his regent bodhisattva, Dharma­dhara.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many buddhafields as atoms in the sun-god’s realm, is a world called Good Moon.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te; bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog rab gtor ces bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam mtha' yas go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te; bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog rab gtor ces bya ba btang ngo //
translated: There resides the tathagata called Armor of Infinite Vows. Abiding and maintaining himself, he teaches the Dharma. This tathagata dispatched his regent bodhisattva called Flower Scatterer.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many buddhafields as atoms in the sun-god’s realm, is a world called Very Stable.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rgyal po rab gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rgyal po rab gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: There resides the tathagata called King of Infinite Qualities, Very Stable. Abiding and maintaining himself, he teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This tathagata dispatched his regent bodhisattva called Dharma­bhadra.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nags tshal rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams nags tshal rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many buddhafields as atoms in a buddhafield, is a universe called Stable Forest.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang @112b ston te; bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang @112b ston te; bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: In it resides the thus-gone Heap of Jewels. Abiding and remaining present there, he teaches the Dharma. This blessed one has dispatched his regent, the bodhisattva King of Medicine.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many buddhafields as atoms in a buddhafield, is a universe called Fragrant.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: In it resides the thus-gone King of the Sāla Tree. Abiding and remaining present there, he teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This blessed one has dispatched his regent, the bodhisattva Special Intelligence.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams padma'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams padma'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many buddhafields as atoms in a buddhafield, is a universe called Lotus Glory.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: The Tathagata Ratna-prabha resides there, lives there, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu mthong zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu mthong zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Bhagavat has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva, Seeing-Extensively.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: In the next world-system, Heap-of-Mountains,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: the Tathagata Ratna-kuta resides, lives, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mes byin zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mes byin zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Bhagavat has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva Agni-datta.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan bral zhes bya ba yod de /🔽de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan bral zhes bya ba yod de / de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te /
translated: In the next world-system, Free-of-Sorrow,

original: @113a *// 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: @113a *// 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: the Tathagata Array-of-Infinite-Merits resides, lives, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This blessed one now dispatched his regent, the bodhisattva Well-Discerning Armor.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many buddhafields as there are sands in the river Ganges, there is a world system called Abiding in All Virtues.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: There resides the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha All-Seeing Roar. Abiding and remaining present there, he teaches the Dharma.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun tu sbas zhes bya ba btang ngo //

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen snang zhes bya ba yod de /

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: There resides the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha Sumeru Light. Abiding and remaining present there, he teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Tathagata has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva, Firmly Abiding.

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun gyis brgyan ces bya ba yod de /

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sman ces bya ba btang ngo //

analyzed: de'i yang @113b 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams byang chub yan lag brgyan ces bya ba yod de /

analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te; bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zla ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par
translated: There the tathagata known as King of the Renowned Strength resides, alive and well, teaching the Dharma. This tathagata dispatched his regent bodhisattva, Moon King.

analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te btang ngo //

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang bar byas zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Past that universe was a universe called Always Illuminating,

translated: “Beyond that, there is a world system called Absence of Sorrow, where the thus-gone Sorrowless One lives and resides, teaching the Dharma.🔽This blessed one now gave his prophecy to the bodhisattva Jewel Fire:🔽“‘He will be known as the thus-gone, the worthy one, the completely perfect buddha called Splendor of the Lotus.

analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro // de'i yang 'dab chags @124a *//

analyzed: chen me tog ces bya ba yod de /

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes @138a *//

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dri zhim zhes bya ba yod de /

analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha byon tan byin zhes bya ba btang ngo //

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab @138b chags na 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de /

analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes bsags zhes bya ba btang ngo //

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de /

analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par bsam pa'i smon lam yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te //
translated: There the tathagata called Accomplished Aspiration of Good Thought resides, alive and well, teaching the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This tathagata dispatched his regent bodhisattva called Infinite Aspiration.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de; de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de; de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: “Beyond that, past worlds as numerous as the particles in a world system of a billion worlds, there is a world called King of the Adornments of Cities. There the tathagata called King of the Pure Circle resides, alive and well, teaching the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba btang ngo //

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'od ces bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many buddhafields as atoms in the sun-god’s realm, is a world called Light of Wisdom.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes spos zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /🔽bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya @139a *//
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes spos zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te / bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya @139a *//
translated: There resides the Tathagata called Wisdom Incense, who lives there, lives in ease, and teaches the Dharma.

original: ba btang ngo //
analyzed: ba btang ngo //
translated: This Tathagata has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva Glory of the Source of Wisdom.

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa zhes bya ba yod de /

analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa khang pa sde zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rnam par sems zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Tathagata has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva Mind of Wisdom.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes spos zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes spos zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, there is a world system called Campaka Light.

analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: In that world system, there is a buddha called Sumeru of Wisdom.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo //

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba yod de / de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: “Beyond that, there is a world system called Meru Direction.🔽In that world system, there is a buddha called Dipamkara.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo //

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de /

analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde bdag ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: The Tathagata Sukha resides there, lives there, and teaches the Dharma.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi @139b sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo //

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams grags dga' zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: There is a world system called Kirtidhara,

analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul bral mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi mjed kyi bdag po zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Bhagavat has dispatched his regent, the Bodhisattva Lokesvara.

analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams padma mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de /

analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dri ma med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Tathagata has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva, Stainless.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many buddhafields as atoms in the buddhafields, there is a world system called Source of Infinite Virtues.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: In it resides the Tathagata called Supreme Leader Who Shows Sentient Beings the Right Path. Abiding and remaining steadfast, he teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshal chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshal chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Tathagata has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva Lamp of the Dharma.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, past as many buddhafields as atoms in the buddhafields, there is a world system called Joyful.

analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te / bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems @140a *//
translated: In it resides the Tathagata called Infinite Jewel. Abiding and remaining steadfast, he teaches the Dharma.

original: dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Tathagata has dispatched his regent Bodhisattva Hero.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams so sor bag yangs zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams so sor bag yangs zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, there is a world system called Individual Ease.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtser 'jug rtsom pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtser 'jug rtsom pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: In that world system, there is a buddha named Supreme Leader Who Has Entered the Peak of All Pleasures. He is alive and well, and expounding the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu brtsams pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu brtsams pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This blessed one now has a bodhisattva regent named Always Wearing the Armor of Effort.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu so sor yang dag gnas zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu so sor yang dag gnas zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: “Beyond that, there is a world system called Very Well-Established.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer padma sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer padma sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: In that world system, there is a buddha named Buddha of the Supreme Glory of the Lotus of Unimpeded Light Rays. He is alive and well, and expounding the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This blessed one now has a bodhisattva regent named Voice of the Earth.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: Situated beyond that universe, past as many buddhafields as there are sands in the river Ganges, there is a universe called Endowed with All Virtues.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: In it resides the thus-gone Supreme One Who Reveals the Buddha’s Body to All Māras. Abiding and remaining present there, he teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bltas pa'i byang @140b chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bltas pa'i byang @140b chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
translated: This blessed one has prophesied that a bodhisattva great being called Armor of the Strength of the Roots of Virtue of the Ascertainment of Awakening, Who Looks Everywhere, will awaken to unsurpassable and perfect buddhahood.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' des snang ba chen po de mthong ste /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' des snang ba chen po de mthong ste /
translated: Then the bodhisattva saw that great light

original: gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang thos so //
analyzed: gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang thos so //
translated: and heard that clear voice.

original: thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Having heard this, he asked the Bhagavat,

original: bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra 'di su'i lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra 'di su'i lags /
translated: “Bhagavat, whose is this light and this clear voice?”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Bhagavat said,

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son,

original: nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
analyzed: nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong dag 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
translated: in the western direction, past one thousand innumerable universes, there is a universe called Sahā.

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste /
translated: In it dwells a tathāgata called Śākyamuni. He lives there, exists, endures, and teaches the Dharma.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te /
translated: He teaches the Dharma of the bodhisattva canon.

original: mthu de lta bu 'di ni /
analyzed: mthu de lta bu 'di ni /
translated: This is his power.

original: de'i yin no //
analyzed: de'i yin no //
translated: It is the latter.🔽

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Samanta­netra­niyata­śubha­kuśala­mūla­balāsaṅghaṭṭana­varma­bhūta asked the Bhagavat,

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mche bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mche bar bgyi'o //
translated: I wish to go to that Sahā world to see, venerate, and serve the blessed one Śākyamuni and to meet the bodhisattva Mañjuśrī.”

original: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
translated: The blessed one said,

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son,

original: @141a *// de'i dus la da bab par shes na song zhig /
analyzed: @141a *// de'i dus la da bab par shes na song zhig /
translated: if you know that the time has come, then go.”

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis padma brgyad blangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis padma brgyad blangs nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Samanta­netra­niyata­kuśala­mūla­balāsaṅghaṭṭana­varma­hasta took eight lotuses and scattered them toward the Sahā world and the blessed one.

original: de nas padma de dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te /
analyzed: de nas padma de dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te /
translated: Those lotuses passed by all the worlds🔽and went to the Sahā world.

original: 'jig rten gyi bar dag las 'das nas rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lanta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der so sor yang dag par 'khod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi bar dag las 'das nas rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lanta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der so sor yang dag par 'khod do //
translated: They then passed beyond the worlds and arrived at the Kalandaka­nivāpa in the Veṇuvana by Rājagṛha, where the Blessed One was residing.

original: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i 'khor bzhi po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis de dag mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i 'khor bzhi po'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis de dag mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to //
translated: The fourfold assembly of the Blessed Thus-Gone Śākyamuni’s retinue was amazed to see them.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das la padma de dag gis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'khod do //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das la padma de dag gis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'khod do //
translated: The lotuses then circled the Blessed One three times and remained in front of him.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g-yas pas padma de dag la reg par mdzad nas reg pa tsam gyis padma de dag las kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dag mngon par byung ngo //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g-yas pas padma de dag la reg par mdzad nas reg pa tsam gyis padma de dag las kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus dag mngon par byung ngo //
translated: The Blessed One then touched the lotuses with his right hand. As soon as he touched them, the bodhisattvas’ bodies appeared from the lotuses.

original: byung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas mi snang bar gyur to //
analyzed: byung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas mi snang bar gyur to //
translated: They praised the Blessed One with these verses and then disappeared.

original: bam po brgyad pa /
analyzed: bam po brgyad pa /
translated: Chapter 8

original: mtha' yas mkhyen mnga' @141b gang zag khyu mchog gtso //
analyzed: mtha' yas mkhyen mnga' @141b gang zag khyu mchog gtso //
translated: You are the supreme leader of beings, with infinite knowledge,

original: rang byung mtha' yas chos rnams thugs su chud //
analyzed: rang byung mtha' yas chos rnams thugs su chud //
translated: Self-arisen, you have realized infinite phenomena.

analyzed: khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas rgya chen gda'//

original: 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu snang bar mdzad //
analyzed: 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu snang bar mdzad //
translated: Illuminating all the worlds.

original: de dag sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas //
analyzed: de dag sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas //
translated: Those who have heard the Buddha's name

analyzed: zhu ba'i khyad par kun tu zhu ba dang // sangs rgyas blta dang phyag kyang bgyi slad du //

analyzed: mkhas pa de dag rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mchis //
translated: Skilled in the power of miracles, they have come🔽To see the Buddha and pay homage.

original: byang chub go bgos dpa' bo gang mchis dag /
analyzed: byang chub go bgos dpa' bo gang mchis dag /
translated: Those heroes who are fully armored for enlightenment,

original: mi mjed 'jig rten khams su rab gnas pa //
analyzed: mi mjed 'jig rten khams su rab gnas pa //

analyzed: de dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste //

analyzed: de dag ming dang gzugs dang grags pas 'phags //

original: de dag go cha'i dngos pos mi 'jigs shing //
analyzed: de dag go cha'i dngos pos mi 'jigs shing //

original: sems can smin pa'i slad du yang dag zhugs //
analyzed: sems can smin pa'i slad du yang dag zhugs //
translated: And are truly engaged for the sake of ripening beings.

original: byang chub mchog la ji ltar reg gyur pa //
analyzed: byang chub mchog la ji ltar reg gyur pa //

original: 'jig rten rnam 'dren mchog la de dag zhu //
analyzed: 'jig rten rnam 'dren mchog la de dag zhu //
translated: They asked the supreme guides of the world:

analyzed: ci slad mngon du chos tshol bgyid ce na //

original: bdud rnams gzhom dang byang chub 'thob slad du //
analyzed: bdud rnams gzhom dang byang chub 'thob slad du //

original: de nas zhu ba zhu ba'i sprul pa rnams //
analyzed: de nas zhu ba zhu ba'i sprul pa rnams //
translated: Then the emanations who had asked the questions

original: gang yin de la sh'akya thub pas gsungs //
analyzed: gang yin de la sh'akya thub pas gsungs //
translated: Were addressed by the Śākya sage:

original: 'dren pas yang dag tshig gis de bstan nas //
analyzed: 'dren pas yang dag tshig gis de bstan nas //

analyzed: mi mchog de yi tshig rnams thos gyur te // dga' zhing mgu la rjes su yi rang nas //
translated: ‘Listen to the words of this supreme human.🔽Be joyful, delighted, and full of happiness,

original: bde gshegs phyag 'tshal de dag 'khod par gyur //
analyzed: bde gshegs phyag 'tshal de dag 'khod par gyur //
translated: And pay homage to the Sugata.’

original: sprul pa de dag der ni mi snang nas //
analyzed: sprul pa de dag der ni mi snang nas //

original: gang dag de bzhin gshegs la zhu zhu ba //
analyzed: gang dag de bzhin gshegs la zhu zhu ba //
translated: And those who had asked questions of the Tathāgata

original: de dag gang nas mchi zhing ming ci zhes //
analyzed: de dag gang nas mchi zhing ming ci zhes //
translated: Asked, ‘Where did they come from and what are their names?’

original: de tshe 'khor @142a *//🔽kyang spu rnams zing zhes byed //
analyzed: de tshe 'khor @142a *// kyang spu rnams zing zhes byed //

original: 'khor rnams bzhi po de dag gus pa yis //
analyzed: 'khor rnams bzhi po de dag gus pa yis //

original: rgyal ba la ni zhu bar mi spro ste //
analyzed: rgyal ba la ni zhu bar mi spro ste //

analyzed: de tshe 'jig rten mgon po'i sprul pa sprul //

analyzed: de tshe dge slong kun dga' bzang po byung //

original: mgon po zhu ba 'di zhu de dag gang //
analyzed: mgon po zhu ba 'di zhu de dag gang //

original: zhus nas kyang ni mi gda' ma mthong gyur //
analyzed: zhus nas kyang ni mi gda' ma mthong gyur //
translated: Having asked questions, they disappeared and were not seen.

original: de dag su lags de dag su yi lags //
analyzed: de dag su lags de dag su yi lags //

original: mgon po bshad cing the tshom bsal du gsol //
analyzed: mgon po bshad cing the tshom bsal du gsol //
translated: Lord, explain and remove our doubts.”

original: smon lam dpa' bo ldan pa'i go cha ltos //
analyzed: smon lam dpa' bo ldan pa'i go cha ltos //
translated: “Look at the armor of the hero of prayer,

original: de yis byin gyis brlabs nas 'dir lhags te //
analyzed: de yis byin gyis brlabs nas 'dir lhags te //
translated: who, having been empowered, has come here.🔽From the eastern direction, from countless world realms,

analyzed: shar phyogs kyi ni 'jig rten khams kyi tshul; ;grangs med dag nas de dag lhags pa yin //

original: dpa' bo 'jig rten phan phyir gang lhags pa //
analyzed: dpa' bo 'jig rten phan phyir gang lhags pa //

original: rnam par bltas nas dong bar gyur pa ste //
analyzed: rnam par bltas nas dong bar gyur pa ste //
translated: have looked around and have departed.

original: bsam pa dag pa byang chub phyir spyod pa //
analyzed: bsam pa dag pa byang chub phyir spyod pa //

original: de yi smon lam de ni de 'dra'o //
analyzed: de yi smon lam de ni de 'dra'o //
translated: Such are their prayers.

original: de dag dge bas nges par sangs rgyas mthong //
analyzed: de dag dge bas nges par sangs rgyas mthong //

original: de dag 'dir ni de la sgyid mi lug /
analyzed: de dag 'dir ni de la sgyid mi lug /

original: tshul khrims kyis kyang dman par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis kyang dman par mi 'gyur te //

original: thos pa mang zhing pha rol phyin pas 'phags //
analyzed: thos pa mang zhing pha rol phyin pas 'phags //

original: de dag thabs shes pa la shin tu bslab //
analyzed: de dag thabs shes pa la shin tu bslab //

original: mngal gyi gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: mngal gyi gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur te //

original: 'khor ba'i tshe na tshe rabs tshe rabs su //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i tshe na tshe rabs tshe rabs su //

analyzed: rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon du phrad //

analyzed: rtag tu 'phags pa rnams dang 'grogs par @142b 'gyur; ;dpa' bo de yis sems can 'dir mthong rnams //

original: rtag tu de la rab tu 'byung ba 'thob //
analyzed: rtag tu de la rab tu 'byung ba 'thob //

original: mthong ma thag tu dge bas de 'dra ste //
analyzed: mthong ma thag tu dge bas de 'dra ste //

original: gang dag gzhan ma brjod pa de dag mang /
analyzed: gang dag gzhan ma brjod pa de dag mang /

original: dpa' bo de yi yon tan gang yod pa //
analyzed: dpa' bo de yi yon tan gang yod pa //

original: mang du bsgrags kyang mthar thug 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: mang du bsgrags kyang mthar thug 'gyur ba med //

original: dpa' bo shin tu gnas pa de yi ming //🔽de tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur pa //
analyzed: dpa' bo shin tu gnas pa de yi ming // de tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur pa //
translated: The name of those heroes who are well established🔽Is heard by women at that time.

original: de ni phyin chad bud med dngos mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni phyin chad bud med dngos mi 'gyur //
translated: From then on, they will not have a female nature.

original: sems can dam pa'i mchog tu de 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dam pa'i mchog tu de 'gyur ro //

original: skyes pa bud med gang gis ming thos shing //
analyzed: skyes pa bud med gang gis ming thos shing //

original: thos nas de la'ang dga' ba skyed byed la //
analyzed: thos nas de la'ang dga' ba skyed byed la //

original: sangs rgyas zhing der smon lam 'debs byed pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing der smon lam 'debs byed pa //

original: lus zhig nas ni der yang skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lus zhig nas ni der yang skye bar 'gyur //

original: zhing yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: zhing yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba yin //

original: skyes pa bud med 'on te gzhan yang rung //
analyzed: skyes pa bud med 'on te gzhan yang rung //

original: gang gis ming thos nam zhig dad byed pa //
analyzed: gang gis ming thos nam zhig dad byed pa //
translated: Whoever hears the name and at some point gives rise to faith,

original: thams cad byang chub ched las nyams mi 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad byang chub ched las nyams mi 'gyur //

original: gang dag gcer bu'i sems can ma gtogs par //
analyzed: gang dag gcer bu'i sems can ma gtogs par //

original: thos nas su zhig dga' ba skye mi 'gyur //
analyzed: thos nas su zhig dga' ba skye mi 'gyur //

original: sangs rgyas kyis kyang de ni yongs ma gsungs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis kyang de ni yongs ma gsungs //

original: 'on kyang de dag dge dang ldan par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'on kyang de dag dge dang ldan par 'gyur //

original: gang dag bsam pas ming yang thos pa ni //
analyzed: gang dag bsam pas ming yang thos pa ni //

analyzed: ji ltar rtsi yis skyon rnams sel byed bzhin //
translated: Will be like a medicinal plant that removes faults.

original: sems can de dag gis ni der mthong ba //
analyzed: sems can de dag gis ni der mthong ba //

original: byang chub don du nges 'gyur the tshom med //
analyzed: byang chub don du nges 'gyur the tshom med //
translated: They will certainly attain enlightenment, there is no doubt.

original: gang zhig pa la sha yi 'dab thogs shing //
analyzed: gang zhig pa la sha yi 'dab thogs shing //
translated: “If someone were to take a piece of meat

original: de @143a *// dang der ni rtsi dag byed gyur na //
analyzed: de @143a *// dang der ni rtsi dag byed gyur na //
translated: And make medicines from it here and there,

original: de tshe kun nas sman gyi stobs kyis su //
analyzed: de tshe kun nas sman gyi stobs kyis su //
translated: Then at that time, through the power of the medicine,

original: sus kyang der ni me la tshig mi 'gyur //
analyzed: sus kyang der ni me la tshig mi 'gyur //
translated: No one would be burned by fire.🔽“If the poison of a fierce and powerful snake

original: gang tshe sprul gdug gzi brjid drag po yis; ;dug gang de dag mi gdug byed 'gyur te //
analyzed: gang tshe sprul gdug gzi brjid drag po yis; ;dug gang de dag mi gdug byed 'gyur te //
translated: Were to become harmless,

original: sa yi steng nas kun tu ston byed na //
analyzed: sa yi steng nas kun tu ston byed na //
translated: And if it were to be displayed everywhere on the earth,

original: de 'dra'i sman brkos pas ni ci zhig bya //
analyzed: de 'dra'i sman brkos pas ni ci zhig bya //
translated: What would be the point of digging up such a medicine?

original: sprul gdug dri ni gang dag snom byed pa //
analyzed: sprul gdug dri ni gang dag snom byed pa //
translated: “If someone were to smell the scent of a poisonous snake,

original: sprul de thams cad 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur //
analyzed: sprul de thams cad 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur //
translated: All those snakes would die.

original: de ltar rtsi sman 'dra ba'i mi de ni //
analyzed: de ltar rtsi sman 'dra ba'i mi de ni //
translated: In the same way, that person who is like a medicinal plant

analyzed: ming gis sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur //
translated: Will perform the deeds of a buddha by his name.

analyzed: de tshe phyogs bcu dag tu bsgrags pa na; ;dpa' bo de yi ming ni sus thos pa //
translated: “If at that time the name of that hero is proclaimed in the ten directions,

analyzed: de yi ming gis las ni 'di byed de //
translated: And if someone were to perform this rite by his name,

original: bud med gang zag la ni reg mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bud med gang zag la ni reg mi 'gyur //
translated: And they will not touch a single woman.

original: gang gis mthong dang bsti stang byed cing smos //
analyzed: gang gis mthong dang bsti stang byed cing smos //
translated: “Those who see him, revere him, and praise him,

analyzed: de ni rgyal bas dge slong gang sprul pa //
translated: The bhikṣus emanated by the Jina,

original: kun dga' bzang po zhes ni bya ba des //
analyzed: kun dga' bzang po zhes ni bya ba des //
translated: The one called Ānanda, the good one,

original: rgyal bas de skad bsgrags pa de 'dra ba //
analyzed: rgyal bas de skad bsgrags pa de 'dra ba //

original: byang chub zhugs pa su mchis de la zhus //
analyzed: byang chub zhugs pa su mchis de la zhus //

original: kun dga' bzang po go cha dpa' bo'i ming //
analyzed: kun dga' bzang po go cha dpa' bo'i ming //
translated: Ānanda, the one called the heroic warrior,

original: 'jig rten khams 'dir yod ces ngas thos na //
analyzed: 'jig rten khams 'dir yod ces ngas thos na //

original: zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis brjod par bya //
analyzed: zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis brjod par bya //
translated: I will speak with an undaunted mind.🔽“The Sugata has taught the profound Dharma,

analyzed: de ltar bde bar gshegs pas zab bstan pa; ;rgyal ba'i byang chub yid ches dka' ba yi //

analyzed: sems can dge ba chung dang ldan pa lhags //
translated: There are beings who have little virtue.

original: da ltar nga yi tshe ni cung zad gnas //
analyzed: da ltar nga yi tshe ni cung zad gnas //
translated: “I have a little time left in my life.🔽Ānanda, there is a supreme being here

analyzed: kun dga' 'di na sems can mchog @143b yod de; ;de ring kho nar 'khor du lhags par gyur //

original: 'jig rten mgon po gang dag 'dir lhags pa'i //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po gang dag 'dir lhags pa'i //
translated: “The lords of the world who have come here
