analyzed: 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab s'a la'i dbang po'i tog ces bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This Bhagavat has dispatched his regent, the Bodhisattva Sālarājamukuta.

original: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
analyzed: de'i yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba zhes bya ba yod de /
translated: Furthermore, there is a world system called Ābhā,

original: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
analyzed: de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te /
translated: where the Tathāgata Anantaprabha resides, lives, and teaches the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod gom pas rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod gom pas rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang ngo //
translated: This blessed one now dispatched his regent, the bodhisattva Victorious Footsteps.

original: de ltar byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams nas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag lhags te /
analyzed: de ltar byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams nas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag lhags te /
translated: In this way, from the northeast, countless bodhisattvas, each of whom was only one life away from buddhahood, arrived.

original: lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal cing bskor ba byas te rnam pa du mas mchod nas bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
analyzed: lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal cing bskor ba byas te rnam pa du mas mchod nas bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
translated: When they arrived, they bowed their heads to the feet of the blessed thus-gone Śākyamuni, circumambulated him, and made offerings to him in many ways. Then they sat down to one side, gazing at the Blessed One.

original: de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang; mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu che ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpe med pa'i go cha bgos pa dag gis ma khyab pa'i bar ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang; mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu che ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpe med pa'i go cha bgos pa dag gis ma khyab pa'i bar ni /
translated: At that time, the world was filled with gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, mahoragas, and bodhisattva great beings who were clad in the inconceivable and incomparable armor of great power.

original: tha na 'khar ba gzhag sa tsam yang med do //
analyzed: tha na 'khar ba gzhag sa tsam yang med do //
translated: There was not even room to put a staff between them.

original: de dag thams cad kyang gcig la gcig nyam nga ba med de /
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang gcig la gcig nyam nga ba med de /
translated: And yet they were not crowded.

original: chos mnyan pa'i sred pas bcom @173b ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ba lhur len cing 'khod do //🔽byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i le'u ste /
analyzed: chos mnyan pa'i sred pas bcom @173b ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ba lhur len cing 'khod do // byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i le'u ste /
translated: They were all intent on listening to the Dharma, and they were looking at the face of the Lord.🔽CHAPTER FIVE

original: lnga pa'o //// de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de mkhyen nas gdan de la bzhugs bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: lnga pa'o //// de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po de mkhyen nas gdan de la bzhugs bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Then the Lord Śākyamuni, knowing that the great assembly of bodhisattvas had gathered, while remaining in that very seat entered the samādhi called “Heroic Stride.”

original: de las bzhengs nas rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Rising from that, he entered the samādhi called “Vajra Essence.”

original: de las bzhengs nas nges pa'i tshig med pa'i gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas nges pa'i tshig med pa'i gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Rising from that, he entered the samādhi called “Abiding in the Place of No Verbal Expression.”

original: de las bzhengs nas bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “single array.”

original: de las bzhengs nas sengge'i gdugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas sengge'i gdugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “lion’s parasol.”

original: de las bzhengs nas sgrub pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas sgrub pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “infinite accomplishment.”

original: de las bzhengs nas sengge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas sengge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “lion’s majestic pose.”

original: de las bzhengs nas 'od zer rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas 'od zer rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “king of light rays.”

original: de las bzhengs nas sa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas sa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “earth’s essence.”

original: de las bzhengs nas mngon par ma dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par @174a *//
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas mngon par ma dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par @174a *//
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “non-apprehending.”

original: zhugs so // de las bzhengs nas sengge rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: zhugs so // de las bzhengs nas sengge rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He entered the lion’s display meditative stabilization.

original: de las bzhengs nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He entered the moon disk king meditative stabilization.

original: de las bzhengs nas bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He entered the single array meditative stabilization.

original: de las bzhengs nas 'od zer du ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas 'od zer du ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He entered the many light rays meditative stabilization.🔽He entered the ocean meditative stabilization.

original: de las bzhengs nas rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so; ;de las bzhengs nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so; ;de las bzhengs nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He entered the seal of all seals, ascertained in the realm of phenomena meditative stabilization.

original: de las bzhengs nas smon lam dang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas smon lam dang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Then he rose and entered the samādhi called teaching infinite prayers and visualizations.

original: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad khyu mchog tu gyur pa mtha' yas pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad khyu mchog tu gyur pa mtha' yas pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Then he rose and entered the samādhi called accomplishing the infinite supremacy of all phenomena.🔽Then he rose and entered the samādhi called accomplishing the single focus.

original: de las bzhengs nas dmigs pa gcig pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so; ;de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad kyi gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas dmigs pa gcig pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so; ;de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad kyi gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Then he rose and entered the samādhi called abiding in the abode of all phenomena.

original: de las bzhengs nas 'od zer mtha' yas @174b sangs rgyas padma mngon du 'phags pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas 'od zer mtha' yas @174b sangs rgyas padma mngon du 'phags pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Then he rose and entered the samādhi called accomplishing the supremacy of the buddha lotus of infinite light.

original: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad shin tu byang ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad shin tu byang ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He then rose and entered the meditative absorption called the seal of the complete purification of all phenomena.

original: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad kyi rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad kyi rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He then rose and entered the meditative absorption called the seal of the king of all phenomena.

original: de las bzhengs nas khyu mchog mtha' yas kun tu ston pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //🔽de las bzhengs nas sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i go cha zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas khyu mchog mtha' yas kun tu ston pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so // de las bzhengs nas sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i go cha zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He then rose and entered the meditative absorption called the emanation of the buddhas that displays the infinite bull among men.🔽He then rose and entered the meditative absorption called the armor of the complete nirvāṇa of all beings.

original: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He then rose and entered the meditative absorption called the domain of the thus-gone ones of all phenomena.

original: de las bzhengs nas khyu mchog tu gyur pa mtha' yas pa kun tu ston pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas khyu mchog tu gyur pa mtha' yas pa kun tu ston pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He then arose from that absorption and entered the absorption called “the buddha’s emanation,” which displays infinite supreme leaders.🔽He then arose from that absorption and entered the absorption called “the accomplishment of all objects being the Buddha,”

original: de las bzhengs nas dmigs pa thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so; ;de las bzhengs nas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba la ma chags par chos thams cad nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas dmigs pa thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so; ;de las bzhengs nas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba la ma chags par chos thams cad nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He then arose from that absorption and entered the absorption called “the ascertainment of all phenomena without attachment to the past, future, or present.”

original: @175a *// de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis dbang sgyur ba'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: @175a *// de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis dbang sgyur ba'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He then arose from that absorption and entered the absorption called “the buddha’s supreme leader, the lord of all phenomena.”

original: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He then arose from that absorption and entered the absorption called “the gathering of all phenomena.”

original: de las bzhengs nas brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //🔽de las bzhengs nas rab tu 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so // de las bzhengs nas rab tu 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “steadfast.”🔽He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “increasing.”

original: de las bzhengs nas rab tu mi g-yos pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas rab tu mi g-yos pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “very steady.”

original: de las bzhengs nas mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “unshakable.”

original: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad la lta ba dang rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad la lta ba dang rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “viewing and observing all phenomena.”

original: de las bzhengs nas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “all-illuminating.”

original: de las bzhengs nas ma sgrub par rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas ma sgrub par rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “viewing without accomplishment.”

original: de las bzhengs nas lta ba dang rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas lta ba dang rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Having risen from that, he entered the meditative absorption called “looking and seeing.”

original: de las bzhengs nas mi lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas mi lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Having risen from that, he entered the meditative absorption called “not looking.”

original: de las bzhengs nas chos @175b thams cad thogs pa med pa dang len pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas chos @175b thams cad thogs pa med pa dang len pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Having risen from that, he entered the meditative absorption called “all phenomena are unobstructed and ungraspable.”

original: de las bzhengs nas dbang po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //🔽de las bzhengs nas mi zad la zad mi shes par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas dbang po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so // de las bzhengs nas mi zad la zad mi shes par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Having risen from that, he entered the meditative absorption called “endowed with faculties.”🔽Having risen from that, he entered the meditative absorption called “definite exhaustion and nonexhaustion.”

original: de las bzhengs nas dmigs pa mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas dmigs pa mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Having risen from that, he entered the meditative absorption called “inexhaustible reference point.”

original: de las bzhengs nas dmigs pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas dmigs pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Having risen from that, he entered the meditative absorption called “single reference point.”

original: de las bzhengs nas bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “great array.”

original: de las bzhengs nas bkod pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas bkod pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “infinite array.”

original: de las bzhengs nas bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //🔽de las bzhengs nas sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so // de las bzhengs nas sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par skul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “free from anxiety.”🔽He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “stimulating the roots of virtue of all sentient beings.”

original: de las bzhengs nas sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon du byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon du byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “actualizing the roots of virtue of all sentient beings.”

original: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: He rose from that and entered the meditative absorption called “investigating all phenomena.”

original: de las bzhengs nas snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la @176a *//🔽snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la @176a *// snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Then he rose and entered the samādhi called “illuminating.”

original: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Then he rose and entered the samādhi called “the field of purification of all phenomena.”

original: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas chos thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Then he rose and entered the samādhi called “the teacher of all phenomena.”

original: de las bzhengs nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snang ba rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snang ba rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Then he rose and entered the samādhi called “the purification of the light of all bodhisattvas.”

original: de las bzhengs nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos thams cad kyi sgrib pa med pa'i mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos thams cad kyi sgrib pa med pa'i mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Then he rose and entered the samādhi called “the purification of the unobstructed eye of all śrāvakas.”

original: de las bzhengs nas 'khor thams cad kyi sgrib pa med par rnam par dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas 'khor thams cad kyi sgrib pa med par rnam par dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Having risen from that, he entered the meditative absorption called “the one that perfectly generates the roots of virtue of the purification of the absence of obscurations of all retinues.”

original: de las bzhengs nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Having risen from that, he entered the meditative absorption called “the one that severs the suffering of the animal realm and the world of the Lord of Death.”

original: de las bzhengs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byams pa chen po sgrub pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byams pa chen po sgrub pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Having risen from that, he entered the meditative absorption called “the one that perfectly generates the roots of virtue through accomplishing great love in all buddhafields.”

original: de las bzhengs nas mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
analyzed: de las bzhengs nas mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
translated: Having risen from that, he entered the meditative absorption called “the unwavering one.”

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das mi g-yo ba'i @176b ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das mi g-yo ba'i @176b ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa /
translated: When the Blessed One had entered the immovable samadhi, the gods of the Pure Abodes praised him with these verses:

original: mi g-yo brnyes pas g-yo med mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: mi g-yo brnyes pas g-yo med mi g-yo ba //
translated: Having attained immovability, you are immovable and unwavering,

original: bsnyen dka' lhun po 'dra ba rnam par mdzes //
analyzed: bsnyen dka' lhun po 'dra ba rnam par mdzes //
translated: Difficult to approach, majestic like Mount Meru,

original: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad zil mnan nas //
analyzed: phas kyi rgol ba thams cad zil mnan nas //
translated: Having vanquished all adversaries,

original: stong gsum 'jig rten shin tu blangs te bzhugs //
analyzed: stong gsum 'jig rten shin tu blangs te bzhugs //
translated: You abide, having taken up the three-thousandfold world-system.

original: sangs rgyas thugs ni nam yang rten ma mchis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thugs ni nam yang rten ma mchis //
translated: The mind of the Buddha never relies on anything,

original: mi rten bsam gtan mdzad pa gang zag mchog /
analyzed: mi rten bsam gtan mdzad pa gang zag mchog /
translated: The supreme person practices meditation without reliance,

original: ming tsam bsam gtan pa ste gar mi gnas //
analyzed: ming tsam bsam gtan pa ste gar mi gnas //
translated: Meditation is merely a name, for it does not abide anywhere.

original: sangs rgyas yon tan de 'dra bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yon tan de 'dra bsam mi khyab //
translated: The qualities of the Buddha are inconceivable like this.

original: khyab pa khams gsum nges 'byung rigs gsum ldan //
analyzed: khyab pa khams gsum nges 'byung rigs gsum ldan //
translated: Pervading the three realms, endowed with the three lineages,

original: rtag tu mnyam gzhag som nyi mi mnga' brnyes //
analyzed: rtag tu mnyam gzhag som nyi mi mnga' brnyes //
translated: Always in equipoise, you have attained the absence of doubt.

original: the tshom gcad cing som nyi bsal du gsol //
analyzed: the tshom gcad cing som nyi bsal du gsol //
translated: Please cut through doubt and dispel uncertainty.

original: srog chags rnams la sman slad chos bstan gsol //
analyzed: srog chags rnams la sman slad chos bstan gsol //
translated: And to bring about the welfare of all living beings.

original: thub pa rab gnas som nyi mi mnga' brnyes //
analyzed: thub pa rab gnas som nyi mi mnga' brnyes //
translated: “The Sage is well established and has attained the absence of doubt.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de dag ni //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de dag ni //
translated: The assembly of bodhisattvas

original: dpa' bo chos kyis 'phags shing chos la gnas //
analyzed: dpa' bo chos kyis 'phags shing chos la gnas //
translated: Is heroic, exalted by the Dharma, and abides in the Dharma.

original: som nyi gcad cing the tshom bsal du gsol //🔽sangs rgyas mig brten bsam gtan mdzad ma lags //
analyzed: som nyi gcad cing the tshom bsal du gsol // sangs rgyas mig brten bsam gtan mdzad ma lags //
translated: Please cut through doubt and dispel uncertainty.🔽“The Buddha does not meditate by relying on the eye.

original: sangs rgyas mig ma brten par sgom ma lags //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mig ma brten par sgom ma lags //
translated: The Buddha does not meditate without relying on the eye.

original: rten dang rten min mig kyang mchis ma lags //
analyzed: rten dang rten min mig kyang mchis ma lags //
translated: There is no eye that is a basis or not a basis.

original: bsam gtan de ni 'phags pas mngon par bsngags //
analyzed: bsam gtan de ni 'phags pas mngon par bsngags //
translated: That meditation is praised by the noble ones.

original: thub pa gal te mig brten bsam gtan mdzad //🔽rgyal bas 'dzem pa ma mchis @177a *//
analyzed: thub pa gal te mig brten bsam gtan mdzad // rgyal bas 'dzem pa ma mchis @177a *//
translated: “If the Sage were to meditate by relying on the eye,

original: brnyes par 'gyur //
analyzed: brnyes par 'gyur //
translated: The Victorious One would attain the absence of hesitation.

original: 'dir ni mig med bsam gtan mdzad pa na //
analyzed: 'dir ni mig med bsam gtan mdzad pa na //
translated: But here, without an eye, he meditates.

original: sangs rgyas ma mchis brten nas sgom ma lags //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ma mchis brten nas sgom ma lags //
translated: The Buddha does not meditate by relying on the absence of a Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas dbang po drug brten sgom ma lags //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dbang po drug brten sgom ma lags //
translated: The Buddha does not meditate by relying on the six sense faculties.

original: rgyal ba dbang po ma mchis brten ma lags //
analyzed: rgyal ba dbang po ma mchis brten ma lags //
translated: The Victorious One does not meditate by relying on the absence of sense faculties.

original: 'di la mu stegs gzhan mang de dag 'khrul //
analyzed: 'di la mu stegs gzhan mang de dag 'khrul //
translated: The many tīrthikas are deluded about this.

original: lhar bcas 'jig rten 'gro ba rtogs ma lags //
analyzed: lhar bcas 'jig rten 'gro ba rtogs ma lags //
translated: They do not understand the world with its gods.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la rjes su rnam par gzigs te tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la rjes su rnam par gzigs te tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One arose from the immovable absorption and looked upon the assembly of bodhisattvas. He said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra:

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: chos bzhi po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: chos bzhi po 'di dag ni /
translated: these four dharmas

original: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / mngon par ma dmigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub pa dang / sbyin pa'i stobs sgrub pa dang /
analyzed: theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / mngon par ma dmigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrub pa dang / sbyin pa'i stobs sgrub pa dang /
translated: are for those who have entered the Great Vehicle, so that they do not regress, so that they accumulate the merit of all roots of virtue, so that they accomplish the non-apprehending wisdom of the buddhas, and so that they accomplish the power of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi stobs sgrub pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs sgrub pa dang / byams pa'i stobs sgrub pa dang / snying rje'i stobs sgrub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs sgrub pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs sgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thogs pa med pa sgrub pa dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi stobs sgrub pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs sgrub pa dang / byams pa'i stobs sgrub pa dang / snying rje'i stobs sgrub pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs sgrub pa dang / shes rab kyi stobs sgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thogs pa med pa sgrub pa dang /
translated: the power of discipline, the power of patience, the power of love, the power of compassion, the power of meditative absorption, the power of insight, and the power of the ten powers of the thus-gone ones.

original: shes rab kyi rab tu dbye ba sgrub pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa sgrub @177b pa dang / gcad du med pa dang / dga' ba dang / rno ba dang / zab pa'i spobs pa mtha' yas pa sgrub pa dang / gzungs thob pa dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi rab tu dbye ba sgrub pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa sgrub @177b pa dang / gcad du med pa dang / dga' ba dang / rno ba dang / zab pa'i spobs pa mtha' yas pa sgrub pa dang / gzungs thob pa dang /
translated: They will accomplish the categories of insight, unimpeded eloquence, and infinite eloquence that is uninterruptible, delightful, sharp, and profound. They will attain dhāraṇī,

original: sangs rgyas mthong ba thob pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba thob par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong ba thob pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba thob par 'gyur zhing /
translated: attain the vision of the buddhas, and attain renunciation.

original: ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dge ba'i tshogs dang bral bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar 'tsham pa'i dge ba'i tshogs dang bral bar mi 'gyur /
translated: They will never be separated from the accumulation of virtue that is appropriate.

original: longs spyod ma tshang ba med par 'gyur /
analyzed: longs spyod ma tshang ba med par 'gyur /
translated: They will have perfect enjoyments.

original: g-yog 'khor ma tshang pa med par 'gyur /
analyzed: g-yog 'khor ma tshang pa med par 'gyur /
translated: They will have a perfect retinue.

original: gzugs mtshang ba med par 'gyur /
analyzed: gzugs mtshang ba med par 'gyur /
translated: Their bodies will be complete.

original: yan lag dang nying lag ma tshang ba med par 'gyur /
analyzed: yan lag dang nying lag ma tshang ba med par 'gyur /
translated: Their major and minor body parts will be complete.

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus ma tshang ba med par 'gyur /
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus ma tshang ba med par 'gyur /
translated: Their eyes, ears, nose, tongue, and body will be complete.

original: sems ma tshang ba med par 'gyur /
analyzed: sems ma tshang ba med par 'gyur /
translated: Their minds will be complete.

original: lam ngan par zhugs pa ma yin par 'gyur /🔽sems 'khrugs pa ma yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: lam ngan par zhugs pa ma yin par 'gyur / sems 'khrugs pa ma yin par 'gyur /
translated: They will not enter into bad paths.🔽Their minds will not be disturbed.

original: dran pa rmongs pa ma yin par 'gyur /
analyzed: dran pa rmongs pa ma yin par 'gyur /
translated: Their mindfulness will not be confused.

original: dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur /
translated: They will have mindfulness.

original: dran pa'i stobs mchog dang ldan par 'gyur /
analyzed: dran pa'i stobs mchog dang ldan par 'gyur /
translated: They will have the supreme power of mindfulness.

original: ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur /
analyzed: ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur /
translated: They will have a sense of shame and a sense of decency.

original: sdig pa thams cad bya ba la 'dzem pa dang / 'gyod pa can du 'gyur /
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad bya ba la 'dzem pa dang / 'gyod pa can du 'gyur /
translated: They will be ashamed of and regret doing any misdeeds.

original: dran pa mi chod par 'gyur /
analyzed: dran pa mi chod par 'gyur /
translated: Their mindfulness will be unbroken.

original: skye ba rnam par log par 'gyur //
analyzed: skye ba rnam par log par 'gyur //
translated: They will turn away from birth.

original: dran pa dang ldan pa'ang yin te /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan pa'ang yin te /
translated: They will have mindfulness.

original: dran pa'i stobs mchog dang ldan pas sngon gyi smon lam yang mi gtong bar 'gyur; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir bdag gi med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba @178a *//
analyzed: dran pa'i stobs mchog dang ldan pas sngon gyi smon lam yang mi gtong bar 'gyur; sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir bdag gi med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyis tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba @178a *//
translated: They will have the supreme power of memory and will not abandon their previous aspirations.

original: dpag tu med pa'ang skyed par 'gyur /
analyzed: dpag tu med pa'ang skyed par 'gyur /
translated: They will plant roots of virtue with the blessed buddhas and, with a mind free from possessiveness and grasping, will also plant immeasurable roots of virtue in the assembly.

original: sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed par yang 'gyur /🔽sems can du dmigs pa las rnam par dben pa la'ang mkhas par 'gyur /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed par yang 'gyur / sems can du dmigs pa las rnam par dben pa la'ang mkhas par 'gyur /
translated: They will share them with all beings.

original: chos rnams rtogs par khong du chud par yang 'gyur zhing chos la brten pa ma yin par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos rnams rtogs par khong du chud par yang 'gyur zhing chos la brten pa ma yin par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be skilled in the discernment of beings and will realize and comprehend phenomena without relying on them.

original: de brten pa ma yin pas bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam /
analyzed: de brten pa ma yin pas bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam /
translated: They will not rely on anything and will not be subdued by Māra or the gods of the Māra class,

original: de las gzhan pa'i sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams kyis thul bar mi nus te /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i sems can lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams kyis thul bar mi nus te /
translated: or by any other beings who have entered the wrong path.

original: byang chub kyi snying po dpung gnyen du'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi snying po dpung gnyen du'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: and the essence of awakening will be their ally.

original: rang gi stan la 'dug ste /
analyzed: rang gi stan la 'dug ste /
translated: They should sit on their seats

original: chos thams cad shin tu byang ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
analyzed: chos thams cad shin tu byang ba dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
translated: and, abiding in the samādhi of the immaculate seal of the complete purification of all phenomena,

original: skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis gang cung zad shes par bya ba dang / blta bar bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang / mngon du bya ba de thams cad kyang mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur zhing ma lus par mngon du byed la /
analyzed: skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis gang cung zad shes par bya ba dang / blta bar bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang / mngon du bya ba de thams cad kyang mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur zhing ma lus par mngon du byed la /
translated: in a single instant, with the wisdom that possesses the realization of all that is to be known, seen, attained, and actualized, they will actualize all of it without exception.

original: thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba kho nar 'gyur /🔽thams cad mngon par rtogs pa kho nar 'gyur /
analyzed: thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba kho nar 'gyur / thams cad mngon par rtogs pa kho nar 'gyur /
translated: They will all attain complete awakening.🔽They will all attain complete realization.

original: thams cad yongs su shes pa kho nar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: thams cad yongs su shes pa kho nar 'gyur zhing /
translated: They will all attain complete understanding.

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ma lus pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ma lus pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: They will attain the complete elimination of all traces.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: 'di la theg pa chen po la yang @178b dag par zhugs pas go cha chen po gyon par byed pa yin /
analyzed: 'di la theg pa chen po la yang @178b dag par zhugs pas go cha chen po gyon par byed pa yin /
translated: Here, those who have entered the Great Vehicle don the great armor.

original: sems can 'di dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag thams cad ni /
translated: “All these beings

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis yongs su gang ba /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag gis yongs su gang ba /
translated: are filled with desire, anger, and ignorance.

original: sems can 'di dag thams cad ni /🔽mgon med pa'i 'chi ba nye bar gnas pa /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag thams cad ni / mgon med pa'i 'chi ba nye bar gnas pa /
translated: All these beings🔽are without a protector, and death is imminent.

original: mthas zin pa'i 'chi ba thob pa /
analyzed: mthas zin pa'i 'chi ba thob pa /
translated: They have reached the end of their lives,

original: g-yang sa chen por ltung bar 'gyur ba /
analyzed: g-yang sa chen por ltung bar 'gyur ba /
translated: and they will fall into the great abyss.

original: sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: These beings

original: 'chi ba la gso ba rnyed dka' ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: 'chi ba la gso ba rnyed dka' ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: have difficulty finding a cure for death.

original: snyam ste / lta ba chen pos sems can la lta ba'i go cha gyon par byed pa yin /
analyzed: snyam ste / lta ba chen pos sems can la lta ba'i go cha gyon par byed pa yin /
translated: ’ With this great vision, they don the armor of observing beings.

original: sems can de dag la bdag gis khams gsum pa las nges par 'byung ba'i theg pa chen po de yang dag par bsgrubs nas bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can de dag la bdag gis khams gsum pa las nges par 'byung ba'i theg pa chen po de yang dag par bsgrubs nas bstan par bya'o //
translated: ‘I will accomplish the Great Vehicle, which is the deliverance from the three realms, and teach it to those beings.’

original: sems can thams cad gso dgos pa'i phyir yongs su ma btsal cing gsol pa ma btab par bdag cag gis blta bar bya dgos so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad gso dgos pa'i phyir yongs su ma btsal cing gsol pa ma btab par bdag cag gis blta bar bya dgos so //
translated: In order to heal all sentient beings, we must look after them without being asked and without being sought out.🔽We must apply ourselves to healing in such a way that sentient beings will attain the unmoving reality of form,

original: ji ltar sems can rnams kyis gzugs kyi chos nyid mi g-yos pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mi g-yos pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: ji ltar sems can rnams kyis gzugs kyi chos nyid mi g-yos pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mi g-yos pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: and will attain the unmoving reality of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness,

original: mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i lam mi g-yos pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gso bas bdag cag gis sbyor bar bya'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i lam mi g-yos pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gso bas bdag cag gis sbyor bar bya'o //
translated: and will attain the unmoving path that leads to nirvāṇa.”

original: snyam du de de ltar sems shing go cha bgos nas chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pa yin @179a *//
analyzed: snyam du de de ltar sems shing go cha bgos nas chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pa yin @179a *//
translated: Thinking like this, they don the armor and strive to seek the Dharma.

original: te; chos gang dag tshol bar byed ce na /
analyzed: te; chos gang dag tshol bar byed ce na /
translated: What is the Dharma that they seek?

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: It is this:

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: It is the ripening of the factors of awakening and the ripening of the qualities of buddhahood.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod par byed pa /
analyzed: 'di lta ste / sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod par byed pa /
translated: It is as follows:🔽It is the acceptance of the Dharma discourse that cuts through the doubts of all sentient beings and satisfies all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzung ba dang / dbang po shin tu rgyas par mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos de dag yongs su tshol bar byed de /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzung ba dang / dbang po shin tu rgyas par mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos de dag yongs su tshol bar byed de /
translated: It is the accomplishment of the attainment of the full development of the faculties.

original: de ltar chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson par gnas pa yin te /🔽tha na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa zab mo dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de ltar chos yongs su tshol ba la mngon par brtson par gnas pa yin te / tha na sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa zab mo dang ldan pa /
translated: Thus, they are seeking the Dharma in order to abide in the pursuit of the Dharma.🔽Even if it is just a single verse of four lines that has the name of the Buddha,🔽is endowed with profound meaning,

original: thabs la mkhas pa dang / don zab mo dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lus la thogs te /
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pa dang / don zab mo dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lus la thogs te /
translated: and is endowed with skillful means, they will carry it on their body.

original: sems can gcig tsam la'ang yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa yin; chos de'i don dang / tshigs su bcad pa de'i don gang yin pa de /
analyzed: sems can gcig tsam la'ang yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa yin; chos de'i don dang / tshigs su bcad pa de'i don gang yin pa de /
translated: ‘May this meaning of the Dharma, and this meaning of the verse,

original: sems can de dang / sems can thams cad kyis kun shes par gyur cig /🔽ces de lta bu'i smon lam 'debs par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sems can de dang / sems can thams cad kyis kun shes par gyur cig / ces de lta bu'i smon lam 'debs par byed pa yin no //
translated: be understood by this being, and by all beings.’

original: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des mchog /
analyzed: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des mchog /
translated: Through that root of virtue, he attains the four qualities that are supreme,

original: gtso bo / rab mchog gya nom pa sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang zhing 'phags pas rjes su @179b gnang la /
analyzed: gtso bo / rab mchog gya nom pa sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang zhing 'phags pas rjes su @179b gnang la /
translated: foremost, excellent, sublime, approved by the Buddha, approved by the noble ones,

original: mkhas pas bstod cing mdzangs pas ma smad pa'i chos bzhi rjes su thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: mkhas pas bstod cing mdzangs pas ma smad pa'i chos bzhi rjes su thob par 'gyur te /
translated: praised by the wise, and not censured by the wise.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four?

original: dran pa gcad du med pa yin /
analyzed: dran pa gcad du med pa yin /
translated: He has unbroken mindfulness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dran pa nges pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dran pa nges pa yin /
translated: He has definite mindfulness of the qualities of the Buddha.

original: bdag nyid kyis kyang chos kyi snod du byed pa yin /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis kyang chos kyi snod du byed pa yin /
translated: He himself becomes a vessel for the Dharma.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rten du gyur pa'ang yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rten du gyur pa'ang yin te /
translated: He becomes a support for the blessed buddhas.

original: de la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: de la brten nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston par mdzad do //
translated: On the basis of that, the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One teaches the Dharma.

original: chos gnyis pa 'di'ang rjes su thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos gnyis pa 'di'ang rjes su thob par 'gyur te /
translated: “This second Dharma will be attained:

original: gzungs thob pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: gzungs thob pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: the attainment of dhāraṇī will be attained.

original: skye ba rnam par log nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thams cad rjes su thob par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: skye ba rnam par log nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thams cad rjes su thob par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: Having turned away from birth, the attainment of all the Buddhas’ enlightenment will be attained.

original: lta ba sdig pa can ma yin pa'i khyim dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: lta ba sdig pa can ma yin pa'i khyim dag tu'ang skye bar 'gyur ba yin /
translated: One will be born in households that are not evil in their views.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la'ang mngon par 'byung ba la yid gzhol ba yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la'ang mngon par 'byung ba la yid gzhol ba yin /
translated: One will be inclined to go forth in the teachings of the Blessed Buddhas.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang spong ba yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag kyang spong ba yin no //
translated: One will abandon the five sense pleasures.

original: chos bzhi po 'di'ang rjes su thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: chos bzhi po 'di'ang rjes su thob par 'gyur te /
translated: “These four Dharmas will be attained:

original: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des chos bcu rjes su thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dge ba'i rtsa ba des chos bcu rjes su thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Through those wholesome roots, ten Dharmas will be attained.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod par byed pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod par byed pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will attain the ability to cut through the doubts of all sentient beings;

original: sems can thams cad kyi rten sgrub pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rten sgrub pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: they will attain the ability to establish the support of all sentient beings;

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa'ang rjes su thob par 'gyur @180a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa'ang rjes su thob par 'gyur @180a *//
translated: and they will attain the Thus-Gone One’s unobstructed liberation.

original: ba yin; rnam par thar pa'i sgo des de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su thob nas spu'i khung bu re re las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum grangs med pa dpag tu med pa dag 'gyed pa yin /
analyzed: ba yin; rnam par thar pa'i sgo des de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su thob nas spu'i khung bu re re las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum grangs med pa dpag tu med pa dag 'gyed pa yin /
translated: Having attained the Thus-Gone One’s liberation, they will emit from each pore of their body countless, limitless quintillions of light rays.

original: 'od zer re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum dag snang bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: 'od zer re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum dag snang bar byed pa yin /
translated: Each of those light rays will illuminate a hundred thousand buddha realms.

original: 'od zer de la'ang padma 'bum dag mngon par sprul par byed pa yin /
analyzed: 'od zer de la'ang padma 'bum dag mngon par sprul par byed pa yin /
translated: Each of those light rays will manifest a hundred thousand lotuses.

original: padma thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sprul par byed pa yin /
analyzed: padma thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sprul par byed pa yin /
translated: Each of those lotuses will manifest the body of the Thus-Gone One.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang chos bstan pa re res sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag yongs su smin par byed de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang chos bstan pa re res sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag yongs su smin par byed de /
translated: Each of the thus-gone ones, through each of their teachings, brings to maturity hundreds of thousands of quintillions of beings.

original: ji ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid mi g-yos pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba de lta bus kyang yongs su smin par byed pa yin /
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid mi g-yos pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba de lta bus kyang yongs su smin par byed pa yin /
translated: They bring them to maturity in such a way that they attain the unmoving true nature of form.

original: sgrib pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa de dang ldan pa spu gseb re re las me'i phung po lhun po ji snyed 'bar bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa de dang ldan pa spu gseb re re las me'i phung po lhun po ji snyed 'bar bar byed pa yin /
translated: With this perfect, unobstructed excellence, they cause a mass of fire equal to Mount Meru to blaze from each of their pores.

original: spu'i cha de nyid las kyang chu'i rgyun gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu 'bab par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: spu'i cha de nyid las kyang chu'i rgyun gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu 'bab par byed pa yin te /
translated: From each of those pores, they cause a stream of water equal to the Ganges River to flow.

original: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa phun sum tshogs pa de dang ldan pas kyang /
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa phun sum tshogs pa de dang ldan pas kyang /
translated: With this perfect, unobstructed excellence of liberation,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams spu gcig gi rtse mos phug /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams spu gcig gi rtse mos phug /
translated: the thus-gone ones can lift the entire trichiliocosm with the tip of a single hair.

original: ste 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'phangs shing /
analyzed: ste 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'phangs shing /
translated: and were to throw them to worlds as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River,🔽and were to throw even more than that,

original: de bas kyang lhag par 'phangs kyang @180b sems can de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du khrid do //🔽kun tu khrid do //
analyzed: de bas kyang lhag par 'phangs kyang @180b sems can de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du khrid do // kun tu khrid do //
translated: those sentient beings would not think, ‘We have been brought to another world,

original: snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: snyam du mi sems so //
translated: we have been brought everywhere.’

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa phun sum tshogs pa de dang ldan pas /
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa phun sum tshogs pa de dang ldan pas /
translated: endowed with that perfection of unobstructed liberation,

original: de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig dag rab tu shes so //🔽sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud lo bye ba phrag 'bum nas skyes pa dang / 'gags pa dag rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig dag rab tu shes so // sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud lo bye ba phrag 'bum nas skyes pa dang / 'gags pa dag rab tu shes so //
translated: the Thus-Gone One knows the languages of all directions.🔽He knows the mental continuums of all sentient beings, from their birth and cessation over a hundred thousand million years,

original: sems can lo bye ba phrag 'bum du skyes pa rnams kyis chos kyi the tshom dag so sor sel bar byed do //
analyzed: sems can lo bye ba phrag 'bum du skyes pa rnams kyis chos kyi the tshom dag so sor sel bar byed do //
translated: and he resolves the doubts of sentient beings who have been born for a hundred thousand million years.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / chos gnas par mi 'gyur ba der yang rnam par thar pa phun sum tshogs pa de dang ldan pas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / chos gnas par mi 'gyur ba der yang rnam par thar pa phun sum tshogs pa de dang ldan pas /
translated: In the same way, in the future, when the Tathagatas do not appear and the Dharma is no longer present, he will be endowed with the perfection of liberation.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems tshar gcad pa'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sems tshar gcad pa'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: He will know how to subdue the minds of all sentient beings.

original: sems rab tu 'dzin pa'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sems rab tu 'dzin pa'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: He will know how to control the mind.

original: sems kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / sems kyi rgyu ba'ang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: sems kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / sems kyi rgyu ba'ang rab tu shes so //
translated: He will know how to connect the mind and how the mind moves.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “ Shariputra,

original: de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
translated: in this way, the Tathagata, having attained the liberation that is free of obscurations,

original: chos thams cad la so sor sgrub pa'i gnas rab tu shes so //
analyzed: chos thams cad la so sor sgrub pa'i gnas rab tu shes so //
translated: knows the state of accomplishment of all dharmas.

original: gcig tu mthar thug pa chad pa de dang / dngos po thams cad kyi stong pa dngos po med par shes pa de dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la bdag gi ba'i 'du shes mi skyed do //
analyzed: gcig tu mthar thug pa chad pa de dang / dngos po thams cad kyi stong pa dngos po med par shes pa de dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la bdag gi ba'i 'du shes mi skyed do //
translated: He knows the ultimate end of all things, and he knows that all things are empty and nonexistent. He does not give rise to the notion of ownership with regard to all things that are grasped at.

original: @181a *// chos gcig nges par bsam na mdza' bshes rab tu shes pa ma gtogs par mdza' bshes thams cad la bdag gi ba'i 'du shes can ma yin no //
analyzed: @181a *// chos gcig nges par bsam na mdza' bshes rab tu shes pa ma gtogs par mdza' bshes thams cad la bdag gi ba'i 'du shes can ma yin no //
translated: If they contemplate a single phenomenon, they will understand all friends except for the most intimate.

original: chos ma yin pa spyod pa la mdza' bshes ma yin par shes nas 'dus byas thams cad kyi gnas la yon tan gyi gnas gcig kyang ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa spyod pa la mdza' bshes ma yin par shes nas 'dus byas thams cad kyi gnas la yon tan gyi gnas gcig kyang ma mthong ngo //
translated: Knowing that those who practice non-Dharma are not friends, they will not see a single quality in any of the abodes of conditioned existence.

original: 'dus byas thams cad la yon tan med pa dang / skyon dang bcas par shes nas chos de 'dra ba de dag rjes su thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas thams cad la yon tan med pa dang / skyon dang bcas par shes nas chos de 'dra ba de dag rjes su thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Knowing that conditioned existence has no qualities and is full of faults, they will attain such Dharma.

original: gzhan yang chos bzhi rjes su thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos bzhi rjes su thob par 'gyur te /
translated: “They will attain four further qualities.

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: What are those four?

original: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rgyun chad pa rjes su thob pa yin /
analyzed: bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba rgyun chad pa rjes su thob pa yin /
translated: They will attain the severing of the continuity of karmic actions.

original: lam du 'gro ba na'ang sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs dag la reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad la yang dag par gtad par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: lam du 'gro ba na'ang sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs dag la reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad la yang dag par gtad par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: When they walk on the road, all those beings who touch the feet of the thus-gone ones will be guided to all forms of happiness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor lo'i tshad tsam la gzigs na'ang de lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams nas dpag tshad drug cu rtsa gnyis su sa yongs su g-yos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor lo'i tshad tsam la gzigs na'ang de lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams nas dpag tshad drug cu rtsa gnyis su sa yongs su g-yos par 'gyur ro //
translated: When the Tathāgata looks at a wheel-turning king, even if it is only for the length of time it takes to snap one’s fingers, the earth shakes in an area of sixty-two yojanas in the southwest.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni /
translated: the Tathāgata

original: gang mnyam par ma bzhag par 'gyur ba'i thugs 'ga' yang mi mnga' ste /
analyzed: gang mnyam par ma bzhag par 'gyur ba'i thugs 'ga' yang mi mnga' ste /
translated: does not have any thoughts that are not in equipoise.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
translated: the Tathāgata

original: rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no //
translated: is always in equipoise.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de bzhin gshegs @181b pa la ni /🔽ting nge 'dzin las nyams pa'am /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs @181b pa la ni / ting nge 'dzin las nyams pa'am /
translated: the Tathāgata🔽does not have any loss of samādhi

original: ting nge 'dzin las g-yo ba mi mnga' ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las g-yo ba mi mnga' ste /
translated: or wavering from samādhi.

original: sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a ra dva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni /
translated: in short, all the qualities of a buddha

original: chos yongs su tshol ba la rag las pa yin no //
analyzed: chos yongs su tshol ba la rag las pa yin no //
translated: depend on the pursuit of the Dharma.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
translated: Then the Bhagavān spoke these verses:

original: gang gi don du theg pa yis //
analyzed: gang gi don du theg pa yis //
translated: “For the sake of the vehicle

original: sems can rnams la'ang snying rje nyid //
analyzed: sems can rnams la'ang snying rje nyid //
translated: And compassion for sentient beings.

original: chos la gus dang bcas pa yis //
analyzed: chos la gus dang bcas pa yis //
translated: With respect for the Dharma,

original: ye shes de yi pha rol 'gro //🔽sems can rnams kyi sems shes dang // 'jig rten gsum du mi g-yos pa'i //
analyzed: ye shes de yi pha rol 'gro // sems can rnams kyi sems shes dang // 'jig rten gsum du mi g-yos pa'i //
translated: One will attain the other shore of wisdom.🔽One who wishes to know the minds of sentient beings

original: rdzu 'phrul rtog par gang 'dod pas //🔽chos la gus dang bcas par bya //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul rtog par gang 'dod pas // chos la gus dang bcas par bya //
translated: And to perform miracles without moving from the three worlds🔽Should respect the Dharma.

original: chos la gus dang bcas byas na //
analyzed: chos la gus dang bcas byas na //
translated: Having respected the Dharma,

original: rtag tu mchod 'os nyid du 'gyur //🔽sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas pa'i //
analyzed: rtag tu mchod 'os nyid du 'gyur // sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas pa'i //
translated: One will always become worthy of offerings.🔽One will also touch the supreme Dharma

original: chos mchog la yang reg par 'gyur //
analyzed: chos mchog la yang reg par 'gyur //
translated: Of the infinite qualities of the Buddha.

original: chos la gus par byas na ni //
analyzed: chos la gus par byas na ni //
translated: If one respects the Dharma,

original: de yi dran pa nyams mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi dran pa nyams mi 'gyur //
translated: One's mindfulness will not decline.

original: skye ba de dang de kun tu //
analyzed: skye ba de dang de kun tu //
translated: In all those lives,

original: de yi dran par rab tu 'phel //
analyzed: de yi dran par rab tu 'phel //
translated: One's mindfulness will greatly increase.

original: chos de la ni gus byas na //
analyzed: chos de la ni gus byas na //
translated: Having respected the Dharma,

original: gzugs las nyams par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: gzugs las nyams par mi 'gyur te //
translated: One will not decline in physical appearance.🔽One's major and minor body parts will be beautiful,

original: yan lag nying lag mdzes pa dang // rtag tu tshul du shis par 'gyur //
analyzed: yan lag nying lag mdzes pa dang // rtag tu tshul du shis par 'gyur //
translated: And one will always be well-proportioned.

original: rtag par 'dren rnams mnyes byed cing //
analyzed: rtag par 'dren rnams mnyes byed cing //
translated: One will always please the leaders

original: mthong na de la dad byed la //
analyzed: mthong na de la dad byed la //
translated: And be faithful upon seeing them.

original: sems kyi 'du byed dad pa yis //
analyzed: sems kyi 'du byed dad pa yis //
translated: And with the mental formation of faith,

original: 'jig rten 'dren rnams mchod byed pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dren rnams mchod byed pa //
translated: They make offerings to the guides of the world.

original: skye ba de dang de kun tu //
analyzed: skye ba de dang de kun tu //
translated: In all those lives,

original: de yi dad pa rab tu @182a *//
analyzed: de yi dad pa rab tu @182a *//
translated: Their faith will increase.

original: 'phel;/ 'dod pa ngan pa sten mi byed //
analyzed: 'phel;/ 'dod pa ngan pa sten mi byed //
translated: They will not pursue evil desires,

original: spangs nas myur du rab tu 'byung //🔽rtag tu tshul khrims phung po la'ang //
analyzed: spangs nas myur du rab tu 'byung // rtag tu tshul khrims phung po la'ang //
translated: But quickly give them up and go forth.🔽The wise ones will always

original: mkhas pa rab tu gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: mkhas pa rab tu gnas par 'gyur //
translated: Abide in the aggregate of discipline.

original: tshul khrims kyis kyang rlom sems med //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyis kyang rlom sems med //
translated: They will not be conceited about their discipline,

original: de la ting 'dzin tshol bar byed //
analyzed: de la ting 'dzin tshol bar byed //
translated: But will seek out samādhi.

original: rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur //
translated: They will always be in equipoise,

original: ting nge 'dzin la rlom sems med //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la rlom sems med //
translated: But will not be conceited about their samādhi.🔽They will always rely on wisdom,

original: 'jig rten kun gyi mchog gang yin //🔽shes rab la yang phyir zhing sten //🔽rtag tu'ang ye shes ldan par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun gyi mchog gang yin // shes rab la yang phyir zhing sten // rtag tu'ang ye shes ldan par 'gyur //
translated: Which is the highest in the world.🔽They will always have wisdom

original: ye shes kyis kyang rlom sems med //
analyzed: ye shes kyis kyang rlom sems med //
translated: And will not be conceited about their wisdom.

original: ye shes de yis mi rlom zhing //🔽de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol //
analyzed: ye shes de yis mi rlom zhing // de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol //
translated: They will not be conceited about that wisdom🔽And will seek out the buddhas’ qualities.

original: sangs rgyas kyis ni bsngags pa'i gzungs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis ni bsngags pa'i gzungs //
translated: They will seek the dhāraṇīs praised by the buddhas.

original: chos kyi snang ba thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: chos kyi snang ba thob par 'gyur //
translated: And will attain the light of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi snod du mkhyen nas kyang //
analyzed: chos kyi snod du mkhyen nas kyang //
translated: Knowing that they are vessels of the Dharma,

original: ston pas de la byin rlob mdzad;/
analyzed: ston pas de la byin rlob mdzad;/
translated: The Teacher will bless them.

original: chos smra de ni byin brlabs 'gyur //
analyzed: chos smra de ni byin brlabs 'gyur //
translated: Those Dharma teachers will be blessed,

original: srog chags phan phyir chos ston cing //
analyzed: srog chags phan phyir chos ston cing //
translated: And will teach the Dharma for the benefit of living beings.

original: thogs med tshig dang spobs ldan te //
analyzed: thogs med tshig dang spobs ldan te //
translated: They will have unimpeded speech and eloquence,

original: so so rig thob mthu chen 'gyur //
analyzed: so so rig thob mthu chen 'gyur //
translated: And will attain the great power of discernment.🔽They will uphold the Dharma at the beginning, in the middle,

original: thog ma'i dus dang bar dus dang // tha ma'i dus su chos 'dzin 'gyur //
analyzed: thog ma'i dus dang bar dus dang // tha ma'i dus su chos 'dzin 'gyur //
translated: And at the end.

original: kun tu rtag par sangs rgyas bsngags //
analyzed: kun tu rtag par sangs rgyas bsngags //
translated: They will always be praised by the Buddhas,

original: mi rnams kyi ni don chen byed //
analyzed: mi rnams kyi ni don chen byed //
translated: And will accomplish great benefit for humans.

original: de bzhin lha rnams bsngags pa brjod //
analyzed: de bzhin lha rnams bsngags pa brjod //
translated: The gods will also speak their praises,

original: gnod sbyin klu yis de mchod 'gyur //
analyzed: gnod sbyin klu yis de mchod 'gyur //
translated: And the yakshas and nagas will make offerings to them.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtag bsngags 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtag bsngags 'gyur //
translated: They will always be praised by the Buddhas,

original: phyogs bcur de yi grags pa 'byung //
analyzed: phyogs bcur de yi grags pa 'byung //
translated: And their fame will spread in the ten directions.

original: chos @182b la spyod pa ma smad pa //
analyzed: chos @182b la spyod pa ma smad pa //
translated: Those who practice the Dharma are irreproachable,

original: de yi snyan grags nyams mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi snyan grags nyams mi 'gyur //
translated: And their fame will never decline.

original: chos min nam yang de mi 'dod //
analyzed: chos min nam yang de mi 'dod //
translated: They will never desire what is contrary to the Dharma,

original: sangs rgyas chos rnams de dag sten //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos rnams de dag sten //
translated: And will rely on the Buddhas and the Dharma.

original: sems can rnams kyi som nyi gcod de ni chos kyi snang ba byed //🔽rnal 'byor tshul du srog chags kyi //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi som nyi gcod de ni chos kyi snang ba byed // rnal 'byor tshul du srog chags kyi //
translated: And they clear away the doubts of sentient beings, thus they are the light of the Dharma.🔽They purify the elements of living beings

original: khams ni de yis rnam par sbyong //
analyzed: khams ni de yis rnam par sbyong //
translated: By means of the yoga of the bodhisattvas.

original: de ni lam ngan ston mi byed //
analyzed: de ni lam ngan ston mi byed //
translated: They do not teach the wrong path,

original: drang po'ang rab tu ston par byed //
analyzed: drang po'ang rab tu ston par byed //
translated: But they do teach the right path.

original: sangs rgyas chos la des pa yis //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos la des pa yis //
translated: They are skilled in the Buddha’s teachings

original: chos kyi mchog gis spyod par 'gyur //
analyzed: chos kyi mchog gis spyod par 'gyur //
translated: And practice the supreme Dharma.

original: de ni sems la brten pa med //
analyzed: de ni sems la brten pa med //
translated: They do not rely on the mind,

original: de yi gnas ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: de yi gnas ni yod ma yin //
translated: Nor do they have a basis.

original: rten pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
analyzed: rten pa med pa'i sems kyis su //
translated: With a mind that is without a basis,

original: byang chub spyad pa spyod par byed //
analyzed: byang chub spyad pa spyod par byed //
translated: They practice the conduct of enlightenment.

original: yul 'khor grong du spyod byed kyang //
analyzed: yul 'khor grong du spyod byed kyang //
translated: They may practice in a town or a village,
